summary: Introduces the humanoid khajiit race, the Ohmes-Raht into Skyrim. Includes 4 breeds - UNP adult and kitten as well as CBBE adult and kitten.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2em1t6o.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[b][size=6]Ohmes-Raht Khajiit:[/size][/b]
The mysterious people of Elsweyr introduced to Skyrim. 

[url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Khajiit#Sub-species_Notes]From the UESP[/url]:
[i]\"Similar to the race of men, save for their short, light-colored fur, the Ohmes-raht may easily be mistaken as men at a distance. Unlike the many other species of Khajiit who walk like cats upon the balls of their feet, the Ohmes-raht walk upon their heels.\"[/i]

This mod is reasonably lore-friendly. I know that this version of the race is still a little too catlike and not \"mer\" enough. But they look pretty and should be a perfect race for anyone who wants to play a feral sneakthief without being a fully anthropomorphized kittycat.

This version of the mod is Safe For Work; they\'re wearing underwear. If you\'re interested in the original version, check [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418[/url].

[b]~ FEATURES:[/b]
This includes 4 versions of the race. Here is a guide to who\'s who:

[ul]
[*]Ohmes-Raht - UNP, full-grown
[*]Ohmes-Raht Breed - CBBE, full-grown
[*]Ohmes-Raht Kitten - UNP, kitten
[*]Ohmes-Raht Kitling - CBBE, kitten
[/ul]

New racial ability: [i]Ahnassi\'s Wisdom[/i]. 
Grants a bonus to Barter and Speechcraft for 30 seconds.

[b]~ INSTALLATION:[/b]
Unpack the zip and copy the files into your /skyrim/Data/ folder. Alternately, use the Nexus Mod Manager.

[b]~ NOTES:[/b]
Although this race is self-contained and will not affect your vanilla races, it is recommended that you load the esp after anything else that might affect bodies/faces. 
Extended Slider Colors is known to cause issues with custom races, for example.

Because the ears are an attached HeadPart, they will stick out of helmets.

[b]~ CHANGELOG:[/b]
1.0
Mod uploaded. Includes mounted combat fix, DB quest fix, Dawnguard vampire fix.

[b]~ PLANNED UPDATES:[/b]
[ul]
[*]Create optional UNP-only and CBBE-only versions.
[*]Improve textures. They could still use a little finesse.
[*]Add fur pattern options. I\'ll probably either do this using tattoos or by leveraging presets.
[/ul]

[b]~ CREDITS:[/b] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2439264]kraken973[/url] - Textures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4057950]angelmeats[/url] - Engineering, additional texture editing

[b]~ RESOURCE CREDITS (Portions of creators\' works used in the creation of this race):[/b]
calyps - For his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14205]Khajiit Cat Ears[/url].
KisaFayd - For the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4962]Kisa Khajiit nude fur textures[/url], used as a base for the Breed skin.
poliorketika - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6345]Dragon underwear[/url] texture (CBBE).
RAN46 - For his always popular [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127]head mesh[/url].
Dimon - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP Dimonized[/url] body.
Caliente - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE female body[/url] and the amazing BodySlide utility.
CherryHotaling - For [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]the bounce[/url].

[b]~ ALTERNATIVES[/b]
For another interpretation of the Ohmes Raht, take a look at the talented Mr. Brazoragh\'s mod here - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18898]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18898[/url]

Also check out my rendition of the standard Ohmes race here - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20766]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20766[/url]

[b]~ COMPLAINTS AND BUG REPORTS:[/b]
angelmeats(at)gmail - or leave a message on the forum.
author: angelmeats
